TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SnapLine extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示在用户界面 (UI) 中动态创建以便在容器中辅助控件的设计时布局的水平和垂直线段。

span.span: Represents the horizontal and vertical line segments that are dynamically created in the user interface (UI) to assist in the design-time layout of controls in a container.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可视化设计工具支持，以帮助你使用定位和调整设计图面上的控件的大小的常见模式。The following table lists the common modes that visual design tools support to assist you with positioning and sizing controls on a design surface. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |任意形式Freeform|可以自由地控件进行布局。Enables you to freely lay out controls.| |GridGrid|显示静态覆盖的网格，可帮助你对控件进行布局。Displays a static overlaid grid that assists you in laying out controls.| |对齐线Snapline|显示帮助你对彼此之间相对的容器的控件进行布局的参考线。Displays guide lines that assist you in laying out the container's controls relative to each other. 对齐线源自于控件与它们的容器。Snaplines originate from controls and their container.| 类和相关的类型帮助支持对齐线模式。The class and related types help support the Snapline mode. 对齐线动态生成并自动为控件边缘将移至另一控件或其附近其容器的边界。Snaplines are generated dynamically and automatically as a control edge moves near another control or near the boundaries of its container. 这会时发生控件从工具箱中，添加或移动窗口或调整鼠标操作或键盘命令。This can occur when a control is added from the toolbox, or moved or resized by mouse operations or keyboard commands. 控件通常具有定义; 的水平和垂直对齐线矩形控件，这些通常将扩展从所有四个边缘。Controls typically have both horizontal and vertical snaplines defined; for rectangular controls, these typically extend from all four edges. 类使用只有少数属性来描述每个对齐线下, 表中所示。The class uses only a few properties to describe each snapline, as shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定的位置和方向的相对于其关联控件的行。Specifies the location and direction of the line with respect to its associated control. 通常情况下，仅的相似类型的对齐线将自动对齐彼此。Typically, only snaplines of similar types will auto-align to each other.| ||指定以到对齐线的开始处的来源，这是控件的左上角，从像素为单位的距离。Specifies the distance in pixels from the origin, which is the upper-left corner of the control, to where the snapline starts.| ||指定对齐线的相对重要性。Specifies the relative importance of the snapline. 在任何给定的布局决策点，将显示仅的对齐线处于活动状态并且具有最高优先级。During any given layout decision point, only the snaplines that are active and have the highest priority are displayed.| ||定义自定义类别的对齐线。Defines custom categories of snaplines. 这是一个可选的字符串。This is an optional string.| | 和 and |指示对齐线是否分别具有水平或垂直方向。Indicates whether a snapline has horizontal or vertical orientation, respectively.| 类存储在其相应的控件类型的对齐线属性。The class stores snaplines for its corresponding control type in the property. 对齐线此基类处理将满足大多数控件，因为它定义， ， ，和对齐线，沿控件的边缘对齐。This base class handling of snaplines will suffice for the majority of controls, as it defines the , , , and snaplines, which are aligned along the edges of the control. 当你正在开发一个自定义控件，如果此默认组织不满足需要时，重写类的属性派生自。When you are developing a custom control, if this default organization does not suffice, override the property of the class derived from . 例如，你可能想要将基于文本的控件，如标签，使用 top 和基本行 （而不是控件边缘和下边缘） 文本的水平对齐线对齐。For example, you may want to align the horizontal snaplines of text-based controls, such as labels, with the top and base lines of the text (instead of the top and bottom edges of the control). 不能从派生类。The class cannot be derived from. Visual Studio 中对此功能提供广泛支持，请参阅[演练： 在 Windows 窗体使用对齐线上排列控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-arranging-controls-on-windows-forms-using-snaplines.md)。There is extensive support for this feature in Visual Studio, see [Walkthrough: Arranging Controls on Windows Forms Using Snaplines](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-arranging-controls-on-windows-forms-using-snaplines.md).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应只显式创建对齐线来替换或补充可视化设计器所提供的默认对齐线行为。You should only explicitly create snaplines to replace or supplement the default snapline behavior offered by the visual designer. 若要创建对齐线，应实例对齐线，并将其添加到属性类。To create a snapline, you should instance a snapline and then add it to the property of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将所有对齐线的属性设置为程序员提供的值。This constructor sets all of the properties of a snapline to programmer-supplied values.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AdjustOffset (int adjustment);
.method public hidebysig instance void AdjustOffset(int32 adjustment) cil managed
Public Sub AdjustOffset (adjustment As Integer)
public: void AdjustOffset(int adjustment);

param.name: adjustment
param.span: 对齐线偏移量更改的像素数。

span.span: The number of pixels to change the snapline offset by.

summary.span: 调整对齐线的 属性。

span.span: Adjusts the property of the snapline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对齐线的偏移量是以像素为单位，对齐线所在从关联的控件的左上角原点的距离。The offset of a snapline is the distance, in pixels, that the snapline is located from the associated control's upper-left origin. 虽然偏移量可以设置为任何整数值，通常对齐线会保留通过隐式的空间关系其属性值。Although the offset can be set to any integer value, typically the snaplines retain the spatial relationships implied by their property value.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Filter { get; }
.property instance string Filter
Public ReadOnly Property Filter As String
public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与此对齐线关联的由程序员定义的筛选器类别。

span.span: Gets the programmer-defined filter category associated with this snapline.

value.span: 一个 定义筛选器类别。

span.span: A that defines the filter category.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于定义自定义类别的对齐线。The property is used to define custom categories of snaplines. 仅具有相同的筛选器名称的对齐线是能够彼此对齐。Only snaplines with the same filter name are able to snap to each other. 此属性可以用于在设计器中自定义控件公开不同类别的对齐线取决于控件的状态或正在执行的操作的类型。This property can be used in custom control designers to expose different categories of snaplines depending upon the state of the control or the type of operation being performed. 例如，圆形控件可能提供自定义筛选器值为"中心"对齐线。For example, round controls could offer a custom snapline with the filter value of "Center". 此属性在构造过程已初始化，并且以后不能更改。This property is initialized during construction and cannot be changed thereafter.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Offset { get; }
.property instance int32 Offset
Public ReadOnly Property Offset As Integer
public: property int Offset { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取对齐线偏离关联控件的原点的像素数。

span.span: Gets the number of pixels that the snapline is offset from the origin of the associated control.

value.span: 对齐线的偏移量（单位为像素）。

span.span: The offset, in pixels, of the snapline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的原点的是该控件的左上角点。The origin of a control is the upper-left point of the control. 单个的偏移量可以描述对齐线的位置，因为垂直对齐线可能有仅非零的 x 轴的偏移量，而水平对齐线只能有一个非零的 y 轴偏移量。A single offset can describe the position of a snapline, because vertical snaplines may have only a nonzero x-axis offset, whereas horizontal snaplines may only have a nonzero y-axis offset. 属性在构造时已初始化，但可以使用此后更改方法。The property is initialized at construction time, but it can be changed thereafter with the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority Priority { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority Priority
Public ReadOnly Property Priority As SnapLinePriority
public: property System::Windows::Forms::Design::Behavior::SnapLinePriority Priority { System::Windows::Forms::Design::Behavior::SnapLinePriority get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示对齐线的相对重要性的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the relative importance of the snapline.

value.span: 表示对齐线优先级类别的 。

span.span: A that represents the priority category of a snapline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性建立的与控件关联的对齐线的重要性的类别。The property establishes categories of importance for the snaplines associated with a control. Windows 窗体设计器使用此属性来确定显示在控件的添加、 期间的对齐线调整大小，或移动操作。The Windows Forms Designer uses this property to determine which snaplines to display during a control addition, resize, or move operation. 有关详细信息，请参见 枚举。For more information, see the enumeration. 此属性在构造过程已初始化，并且以后不能更改。This property is initialized during construction and cannot be changed thereafter.

summary.span: 获取对齐线的类型，它指示一般位置和方向。

span.span: Gets the type of a snapline, which indicates the general location and orientation.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示对齐线相对于控件边缘的方向和一般位置。

span.span: A that represents the orientation and general location, relative to control edges, of a snapline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可视化设计器使用属性以指示对齐操作。Visual designers use the property to direct snap alignment operations. 通常仅同样面向的对齐线可以彼此对齐。Typically only snaplines that are similarly oriented can snap to each other. 例如，两个对齐线的类型可以对齐在一起，但和对齐线不能。For example, two snaplines of type can snap together, but a and a snapline cannot. 此属性在构造过程已初始化，并且以后不能更改。This property is initialized during construction and cannot be changed thereafter.

Public Overrides Function ToString () As String
public: override System::String ^ ToString();

summary.span: 返回当前对齐线的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Returns a string representation of the current snapline.
A that represents the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回一个字符串，包含有关类型、 偏移量、 优先级和对齐线的筛选器值的详细信息。This method returns a string that contains details about the type, offset, priority, and filter values of the snapline.
